channel.title: [317 or 377] need a npcdrop.cfg file like or exactly like runescapes [317 or 377
channel.description:
Im looking for a npcdrops.cfg like or exactly like runescapes.
Requirements must be for almost or all npcs must be a 317-377 (any between will be fine) must be non edited or little edited[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 01:12:55 pm[/size] [hr] sorry if i posted in wrong area i dont post very often move if needed
ps: please do not leave notes like "just make it" or "nub" or "you will never find one" or '' give up '' ps again: If u have any other files like or exactly like runescape post it here and tell me what it is.
thank you Mausterios

item.title: [317 or 377] need a npcdrop.cfg file like or exactly like runescapes [317 or 377
item.dc:creator: @mausterios mausterios
item.description:
@mausterios wrote:

moparscape used to have it when u downloaded on 3.0 but u cant get source no more
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2009, 02:27:32 pm[/size][hr]if i made it my self it would take months to code it by my self this is going to be my v3 my first was a allstarscape v2 second i think it was testscape i think and now im coding one from scratch ive been working on it for 6 months and it will take me a nother 2-3 months to code all of it.

@johno2 wrote:

Yo dude, this would take days to complete, also once you’ve done everything in shops.cfg you need to edit the client.java!!

Trust me dude, know one will do this for you! (Unless they want to prove me wrong :L )
[/quote]
It wont take days lol:p more like 2-3, as long as you have access to every store around runescape:P[/quote]
yeh lol, then you need to ge the wanneshop ids :L Oh yeh, and also link that to the shop.cfg file
